description.p: A friendly ghost that floats around your desktop, says cute things, and occasionally scares you! Features transparent floating animation, speech bubbles with ghost puns, and a scare mode that pops up every few minutes.
Settings dialog, system tray icon, eye/mouth/arm animations, speech bubble readability fix, ghost scaling, and custom phrases support.
Ghost now stays behind windows and pops to front during scare animations. Added --monitors flag to filter by manufacturer. Opacity driven via painter for smoother rendering.
